storyInfo: With a thief's name plastered over her, Kafka is hesitating on the eve before her arrest, but the one chasing after her is in fact her one and only friend—Silence.

attributes.content: *huff*... C'mooon, even though it has to across the river, you're STILL on me?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: That's the lockdown perimeter dead ahead! No more runnin' for Kafka!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Freaking dang heavy-as-butt box. Knocks a Kafka's lungs out...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I told you before. This has bearing upon far more than you alone, Kafka.
You're running straight into the search for you. If you do want to escape, then this is the wrong direction.
Okay, you WANT li'l Kafka to bounce?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Are you just keepin' me at arm's length all the time 'cause you don't wanna get involved with me?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Siiii-lennnnce.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I just don't want to put too much pressure on you. I'm with Rhine Lab, after all.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: My colleagues maintain far too much prejudice, owing to your... background.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: 'It fits just fine that a street hustler like Kafka would run this sort of illegal business'...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But Miss Silence doesn't think a Kafka'd do bad?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: My hope is it wasn't you... and more than me, your mentor, Mr. Laurens, specifically sought me out to stand in your corner.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mr. Laurens relates admittedly that when he first took you in, you retained a number of 'bad habits' from the streets.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But they were only minor tricks learned for your own survival, and meant nothing inherent.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mr. Laurens sure knows his Kafkaology.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: He's been swell to me, sure, I can tell you that.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I'm here in the picture because I do not want to see my friend wronged by Rhine Lab's negligence.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The instinct imposed on you by your living conditions should not be any reason for others to question you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But if you absolutely cannot absolve yourself of culpability for theft of the test subject, I can only fulfill my obligations.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Which is why, right now, I need you to cooperate with me and clear up the facts. Things can still be turned around.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This box... this box shackled to you, is the test subject inside it?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Whoa, whoa, that's my secret to keep!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Yannow the mad—freaking—effort it took for li'l ol' Kafka to lug this box all the way here? Heck, no one else would even—
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: What, don't ignore me here!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Kafka. Your hands. They're bleeding.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Wha? Sheesh, I didn't even notice! Naww, it's okay, that's just a fact of Kafka life. No need to worry at all!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Hey, I'm not a kid here! Put me the sweet heck down!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: My medical drone can help your recovery.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Buh.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: (C'mon, Silence, you're pintsize as I am. Where d'you even hide that strength...)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Kafka, you don't have to assume this air of resistance.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hold still!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This customary approach of yours is uncalled for here.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Where's the key? I'll put the specimen back for you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mmrf. Put the Kafka on the floor.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Stop struggling! My drone is still treating you!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence. Put me down.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You hear the sirens thataway?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You think your Rhine Lab researcherhood lets you wrangle cops too?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Lesson, Silence: never ever let anyone else hear your true mind that easy!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You have secrets you're attempting to hide.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You have a mentor who cares for you now. A new life of calm and stability.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Why would you risk all of this to do something that benefits you in no way?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I don't make promises I can't keep, Kafka.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I cannot look on while innocent people are implicated through Rhine Lab's negligence.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: So why am I seeing you now? Silence, is this about helping the innocent, or saving face for Rhine Lab?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: All I know—is that my friend needs help.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Huh. Friend...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Yannow, I just tried to find any proof you were lyin' there. Guess my polygraph says no today.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Might be you really can do the things I can't, Silence.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Alrighty. Ya got any major evidence to help a Kafka's case out?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Given all other surveillance data was destroyed by interference, this was the one and only means I could rescue.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Twelve hours ago...
(Oof, I can't be this beat...)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: (Objection! Kafka isn't even trying to drag this out, the dumb box just weighs a ton!)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: (I did NOT want to draw attention by bein' all loud!)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: (Still too early for 'em to be clockin' in! Alright, Kafka, shut up aaand...)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Inside a markedly spacious room, a small little figure pushes at a huge box completely out of proportion to her height.
She stumbles in her step, she proceeds slow and steady, but she never halts for a moment.
As she passes a half-ajar laboratory door, she suddenly freezes.
She can hear her own heart beating.
(Why's there people?)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Alright, we'll input all the data, then simulate a reproduction one more time.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If the output results are a good fit, then we've saved your industry reputation.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Researcher Silence, you've been up all night rescuing this paper. Please, take a break.
attributes.name: Remorseful Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: I'll handle the remaining work myself. I promise you there'll be no more problems.
attributes.name: Remorseful Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: I'm accustomed to working at night. You should be celebrating that our efforts last evening at least avoided Rhine Lab becoming the laughing stock of our profession.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Remorseful Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: I know you're defiant about this. Shifting numbers around is a common practice in the industry, and we are by and large tacitly aware of it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But everything has to have a line. Cross it, and pulling back becomes very difficult.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm not criticizing you at all. I just hope we can always keep in mind where the boundaries of research lie.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: After all, ingenuity is what shot Rhine Lab to recognition within Colum—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I didn't see anyone.
attributes.name: Nervous Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: (Figures Silence would.)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: (Probably saw me and all?)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: (Hope you're not trying to excuse yourself. C'mon, Kafka, you knew the lab was right there.)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: (And we're here. Is this seriously the job?)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: (Real shame...)
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Flowers're so pretty in full bloom.
These are records of the first ten minutes after the test subject was stolen.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A researcher working overtime noticed the peculiarity, and reported it to Defense.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But before Defense could launch an internal investigation, someone had sounded the alarm.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Not only do all leads at the scene point to you, but you happened to perfectly establish that you were present.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You saw me, didn'tcha?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Yes. And I submitted my testimony.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Likewise, I raised objections too. Due to all concurrent surveillance records suffering interference, they were classed as inadmissible evidence.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I tried to get a colleague who specializes in data recovery to restore a portion.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Kafka, who was it directing you from outside the frame?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Kafka sez: I don't think this evidence is gonna be enough to help me.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: But if you can just return the test specimen, that will be my foothold to wield said evidence, and apply to restart the investigation.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Even still, that's one heck of an uphill climb.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Think back for me, Silence. When you were there in the lab, did ya see anyone else apart from me?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Hear anyone else's voice?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: No... but being engaged in conversation with my colleague likely caused me to overlook any other sounds.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Uh-huh, but'cha see, if they shoot back and ask, how can you prove this wasn't the person on tape just acting?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: How d'ya respond then, Silence?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I have no way to prove that...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yep. You have no way to prove it.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: So are you still willin' to trust me?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Well, that's a headscratcher.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Yannow, I'd like to ask you somethin' too now, Kafka to Silence.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: What if that whole deal on tape really was just me acting? What would you do then?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: There's no motivation for you to take superfluous action...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Not that.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You're here for me, Silence.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: That proves... I can believe a heck of a lot that scared me to even think before.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: The sirens are still blaring close by.
But Kafka doesn't fear the people searching for her.
This perplexed-looking, side-of-justice guest of hers, who strained herself just to 'keep this appointment,' is what she minds more right now.
Kafka trusts that right now, a million problems must be whirling through Silence's mind all at once.
She begins to hesitate. Her ever-unflustered heart grows more and more apprehensive.
'Maybe I shouldn't have led her here.'
She can almost hear her own heart beating.
You look lost as all heck, Silence.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I don't wanna get you into trouble. You oughta hit the road, quick-like.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: This makes no sense. What calls for you to take such a tremendous risk and stay here?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I can hear them searching for you!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You've been homeless in Columbia. You know what follows when an ordinary woman with no status or means is arrested by the police under these circumstances.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Being sent to the frontier may well qualify as the least worst outcome.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I haven't seen the slightest hint of despair in your eyes... You haven't given up.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And here li'l Kafka thought she was keepin' her secrets snug as a safe.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: It's no big deal to me if I get misunderstood. You really don't gotta worry at all, Silence.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Even if they pack me off someplace far away, heck, I'm still confident I'll survive.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Homelessness, jailtime... those don't scare me. They don't scare a Kafka at all.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Kafka, you can excuse these prospects as a fact of your life as much as you want.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But why should an innocent woman suffer meaningless punishment? That's not your mode of life.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This is a matter concerning Rhine Lab. I am bound to ensure your fair treatment.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Even if you do go to prison for it, I am still obligated to ascertain the truth and secure your release.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But right now, so long as you return the specimen, this can all end completely differently.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: So that's what you're thinkin'?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You see things a way different than I do. Nothin' like anyone I've ever known...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Alright, alrighty.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Guess I don't wanna let you down either then!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Joke is I lost the key, but the punchline? Kafka's got other ways into this box.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Watch this!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Heeeeeyaaaah—
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Stop that! Forcefully destroying the container like this might damage the specimen!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Yaaaah—
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Yaaah—yeesh, this hurts—owwwwowowow—
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: This thing's megahard. Don't think one Kafka's got the strength.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Could you lend me your medical drone just another sec?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: That should help a little. Don't be so reckless.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: As for the box... I didn't come completely unequipped for self-defense.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Open sesame! Man, Silence, you're the dream!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Guess it's for real. Some stuff I can't do, you just wave your fingers and it's done.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: No, this was just...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The contents of the box meet the light of day once more, and their brilliant gleam illuminates two faces with two completely different expressions.
Shock here, satisfaction there.
The test subject... it's gone.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Test subject? Hey, I never fessed up to looting any laboratory!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: These suckers are MY shears, and without 'em, I don't even put food on the table. I can't just toss these things away.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: But I clearly saw you taking the specimen in the recording.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You mean the tape you just showed me?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.text: 'What if that whole deal on tape really was just me acting? What would you do then?'

attributes.content: You were drawing attention away from someone else?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Who was it?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Does that matter any? Everyone's dead set that I stole it for a fact.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Doesn't even matter what ol' Kafka did with it. Coulda hidden it, coulda trashed it. Same difference any which way.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: 'Cause the specimen don't matter, and Kafka don't matter neither.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: 'Kafka, that's our thief.' Shutting the book on the whole stupid thing sooner, that's what matters to those guys.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: No one's seriously gonna listen to anything from a pintsize gardener what came from nothing.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I'm still listening, Kafka.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But what if I was tricking you on purpose, huh?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: *sigh* I'm mentally prepared for it... After all, kids like you tend to cause very specific kinds of headaches. You love to keep people guessing, and hate to ask for help in any straightforward manner.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Call me a kid one more time, Silence, I'm gonna turbo-lose it!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: But you really can't help me this time, Silence, because over this entire thing, I didn't see this specimen once.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I'm just lucky I didn't miss my chance to tell you goodbye.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: So could you do me one final favor, Silence?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I've got this little gift saved for Mr. Laurens. If you could just pass it onto him, in a Kafka's place.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: The stuff's stashed in the Rhine Lab HQ, where I first met you.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: That... that's impossible! All external personnel are mandated to undergo strict inspection when entering and exiting the building—when did you—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Somethin' tells me you could make a good guess.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Ten days earlier...
Why were those guys at the door starin' holes in Kafka? She do a wrong thing or what?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Don't mind them; Defense are just accustomed to their job. We don't often have... unfamiliar faces showing up.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Stay close, and don't get lost. Also, remember now: if anyone else gives you trouble for being external personnel, call me right away.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Newsflash: Kafka, not some kid!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I've neglected to introduce myself. I'm—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence. Heheh, Mr. Laurens drilled it into me how I gotta listen to you.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Fine... additionally, be careful with what you're holding. It's not a display item by any means.
attributes.name: Silence
Kafka
attributes.content: Oh, yeah, the folks all call me...

attributes.name: Kafka
attributes.content: Uh, wait, somethin' tells me Kafka's already let the name slip!
Folks? But your files indicated you only had one relative in Laurens, the legendary gardener. Do you have siblings too?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's a new thing! There was a time before Kafka the gardener! You don't know all the places I've been and all the friends I've made!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You mean when you were homeless?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What, you lookin' down on me too?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Sure, I only just started learning gardening, but Laurens says my skills would be way enough to help you guys finish cultivatin' your test samples—
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Kafka, your past experiences will not be a basis I judge you on. I hope that in the time to come, we'll work cordially together.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'll help assimilate you into this place during the experiment. Welcome to—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Wow, that's a beautiful plant! Never seen by Kafkakind before! Why's it in a glass cover?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: This is the fruit of Director of Ecological Muelsyse's research; it's a species already extinct in the wild. In natural conditions, without Rhine Lab's intervention, it would have an infinitesimal probability of survival.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oh, 'cause it's too eye-catching. Gets targeted too easily. If you wanna live, first you gotta learn how to hide.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: That is exactly one of the directions Rhine Lab is taking its intervention. Did you do your homework beforehand?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't gotta. It's somethin' a Kafka just knows.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Why don'tcha straight up get Mr. Laurens in for the experiment?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Unfortunately, Mr. Laurens didn't pass our probe questionnaire. I can't imagine how we'd reconcile his and our attitudes towards treatment of the specimens.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mr. Laurens believes the achievements Rhine Lab makes should be for all to know, and holds firm that we should allow people to witness the beauty of these specimens once again.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hah. The ultimate goal of the gardener.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Yes. Be that as it may, the Rhine Lab ethos is that we endeavor to seek possibilities for a species's survival. Mr. Laurens's thinking regarding these exceptional flora is, well, overly...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Selfish?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Narrow.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: From the researcher's perspective, we worry how difficult it would be to collaborate harmoniously, despite his renowned skills.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You guys talk down Mr. Laurens way too much.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: When you look at him now, you're lookin' at a guy who's been through difficult times—heck, gone through unspeakable things. That's why he's so used to tacklin' stuff from his own angle.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Research shouldn't mix with the interpersonal. Our respect for Mr. Laurens does not imply that we can ignore the discrepancies.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But we are surprised at how astonishingly well you meet our requirements, Kafka, as the student of Mr. Laurens.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: See, it's 'cause I never like to let a good job go! Doesn't matter if it's with Mr. Laurens or with you guys.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Say, once I start up work, does Mr. Laurens still get to come and spectate the experiment?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: We can discuss that later.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sure, then... I wanna tour around this lobby a little more.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: These plants really got an allure a gardener just can't resist.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Man, so pretty... It's givin' all it's got to survive.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Indeed. But without our help, they'd be no more than nutrients in mud.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'll be waiting for you in the laboratory, Kafka.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Thanks for helping me before.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: A small little figure sees a drooping plant beneath a glass bell, trying its hardest to stretch forth its branches.
Fragile. Delicate.
'Borrow power, and survive.'
Kafka can hear her own heart beating.
I planted a seed of one of the specimens there, all secret. Might not ever bud.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I bet'cha it'd really make Mr. Laurens's day for a present. He's been looking forward to this forever.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: But then again, it's property of Rhine Lab in the end, so you make the call, Silence.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Mr. Laurens...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mr. Laurens.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I understand now.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Why didn't you tell us that Mr. Laurens was suspect?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: How am I s'posed to prove that exactly?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: By asking my good friend Silence to stand and vouch for me?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Perhaps 'friend' is one word you can place just a little more confidence in, Kafka.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If you speak and nobody's willing to listen, then I'll stand with you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: There has to be someone who'll stop by to hear out a researcher, correct?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: My drone can guide you through a safe path out.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But how're ya gonna explain to them once I'm gone?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: This is my experiment—supervision and administration are duties I bear by all reason. Even if the specimen is stolen, my responsibility is unavoidable.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Leave any ensuing matters to me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence, you ever think to yourself, 'this is gonna be a major pain in my keister?'
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: I have, more or less. But I can handle it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But what if this is all just Kafka out to trick you into helping her?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Then after I untangle the threads, I'll find you anew.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Submitting an accurate, verified project report to Rhine Lab seniority is part of my duties too.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Seriously, you're a puzzle. Where does all your confidence in me come from?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: That would be my secret to keep, Kafka.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I like it! Let's make a deal, then!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Next time we meet, you'll know every last secret I've got.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: And I can hope you're open to share your own, Silence.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Two months ago...
Researcher Silence, you don't know how thankful I am you could help me complete this experiment.
attributes.name: Apprehensive Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: I've already submitted the application. Here's hoping we can find a good contract gardener to come assist us.
attributes.name: Apprehensive Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Be mindful to screen personnel properly. That lets us avoid unnecessary experimental losses.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Understood. I'll start on getting that ready.
attributes.name: Apprehensive Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Right, I bought you breakfast.
attributes.name: Apprehensive Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Huh? Where'd it go?
attributes.name: Apprehensive Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: In a flash, a small little figure makes off with Silence's breakfast.
A homeless boy clasps the food he's been gifted, and waves to Silence.
But next to him is that small little figure who pulls an impish face, and points at the ground.
Silence lowers her head, and sees a forgotten coin trodden beneath her foot.
That little thief!
attributes.name: Apprehensive Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: This is the first time Silence met Kafka.
One week after the 'Rhine Lab Caper'...
Mr. Laurens, verdict says we've got an innocent Kafka! Aren'tcha happy for me?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You gettin' used to life in the slammer? Yannow, the second they found proof you made me take the fall, they just went and cancelled my whole arrest warrant.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Oh yeah, you get your present from me yet?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Guessin' not. That sucks a million. Doesn't change the huge favor Silence did me, though.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You conned me. I genuinely did believe you were just a homeless wanderer.
attributes.name: Laurens

attributes.content: And Kafka's never ever gonna apologize for that.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: All to get revenge on me. Weren't you worried about getting yourself hurt, and her?
attributes.name: Laurens

attributes.content: Well, hey, didn't get a choice. I'm too puny and small. Some kinds of justice I just gotta chance getting Silence to win back.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Why would someone like you trust a Rhine Lab scientist to help you?
attributes.name: Laurens

attributes.content: Yeah, why is that?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Shame Kafka only tells one woman her secrets.
attributes.name: Kafka
